ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Example program?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well what do you want to present about? REST is a rather big topic. It is difficult to tell what you should present about unless you explain some of your goals

Well what do you want to present about?
REST is a rather big topic.
It is d=
ifficult to tell what you should present about unless you explain some of y=
our goals or the the interest of the audience.


Why are you interested in =
=E2=80=9Creal REST=E2=80=9D?
Why did you think the calculator program would=
 be a good example?


Cheers,


Marijn

com> wrote:

> > presentation next month.

e of a rest project that would use real

> >

I was thinking maybe a calculator program that can use different

s, and there was a suggestion of a hierarchical note taking
> > application=
.
> >
> > Suggestions?
>
> Anyone?
>
